description: Performs spreadsheet-based calculations using recipe variables and operator inputs, displays input and output sheets, and records results.
intent: Allow the operator to view and resolve input variables, perform calculations in spreadsheet format, record any exceptions, and save resulting output variables, optionally generating a PDF attached to the EBR.
postconditions: Values from Inputs and Outputs sheets are saved in the datalines
PDF file is generated and attached to EBR if configured
side_effects: Exception may be recorded if input values are unresolved
example_usage: Operator reviews the Inputs sheet, enters unresolved values or creates exceptions, navigates to the Spreadsheetsheet to view calculations, and clicks Finish to save results and generate the PDF.
